entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:08 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 11:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 15 cm except 5 cm inland. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
